fix #251: Remove post preview after switching from a blog to an empty blog
Added default parameter to getMapInt() and getMapLong()

fix #250: show a VideoPress alert for WP.com blogs
when the user wants to upload a video on a WP.com blog and VideoPress is
disabled.

Use the passed in Blog object to getRecentPostsTask instead of WordPress.currentBlog, so we don't save posts for the wrong blog if the blog is switched during the network call. Fixes #246.

Also removed an unused variable and method in PostsListFragment.
Adding an xxxhdpi app icon. Fixes #254.

Use the passed in Blog object to getRecentPostsTask instead of WordPress...

Merge pull request #292 from wordpress-mobile/issue-283

Fix for issue #283 'ClassCastException in StatsActivity.java'
Upgrade devices model list: added LG D2
Fix #284 by catching the exception in code().

Fix #281 by moving the call that causes the NPE inside the check of 'isInLayout'

The method 'onCreateOptionsMenu' was inflating the menu when the check for 'isInLayout' returned false, but in 'onPrepareOptionsMenu' we were calling 'menu.findItem(R.id.menu_save_media).setVisible(false);' even when the menu was not inflated.
Check that currentBlog is not null. It should never happen here, that currentBlog == null, but an additional check doesn't hurt.
Fix #285 (BadTokenException in StatsActivity) by weak referencing the activity in the Callback, and checking if it is still running.
